messages.subject: Only 4 weeks to register for Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering!
messages.msgSnippet: Online registration for the 2012 Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering at the Kalahari Waterpark Resort in Sandusky, Ohio ends December 31st!   That s less than 4
messages.messageBody:
Online registration for the 2012 Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering at the Kalahari Waterpark Resort in Sandusky, Ohio ends December 31st! That's less than 4 weeks away! Visit the website now to register www.unschoolerswaterparkgathering.com. We have some great events planned, speakers, funshops, discussion groups and more!

Hope to see you there,

Kim
2012 UWG Main Events coordinator
